actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a Select Commission on Territorial Immigration Policy.

summary.text: Establishes a Select Commission on Territorial Immigration Policy to study and analyze: (1)the extent to which territories or possessions of the United States require special treatment under the immigration and naturalization laws; (2)the need of each of the jurisdictions for such treatment; and (3) methods of consulting with and considering the interest, the people and governments of such areas. Requires the Commission to report to Congress within a two-year period following its establishment. Authorizes the appropriation of necessary sums to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Select Commission on Territorial Immigration Policy.
